TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
Wonderful update, Kuzzter.

Your craft never cease to surprise me. And, of course, I *love* the characters. Quite the job keeping them all straight with this many. Thanks for the help with that.

Happy landings!

Aww. That salute...This is going to be a hairy, but absolutely awesome adventure. And a Crowning Moment of Awesome for all involved ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Good luck to you Kuzzter, and to your Kerbals.

![tumblr_lt23ujVy4p1r2xeano1_500.jpg](https://41.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lt23ujVy4p1r2xeano1_500.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-06T16:17:48Z" title="10/06/2015 04:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 6, 2015</time> by Scotius**

> 
> TLDR message from mod about words.

 I should remember this in future for my thread.

...And parkaboy, especially with stories like this:

![9988542558db2712334f2e4333ddc616.png](https://i.gyazo.com/9988542558db2712334f2e4333ddc616.png)

![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Bring them home! Martian references! Yay! Sorry I can't rep you.

> 
> I've been singing '15 Tons' all day. In that spirit I've been thinking of this:
> 
> 
> *Spaceships for sale or rent*
> 
> *Bargain prices - scratch and dent*
> 
> *No deals for rookies or vets*
> 
> *I ain't got no turbojets*
> 
> *One trash can full-o-boom*
> 
> *Might take you up to vacuum*
> 
> *I'm a kerb of means by no means*
> 
> *King of the void*
> 
> *Third transfer, changing plane*
> 
> *Destinations in my brain*
> 
> *Old worn out Kerbfleet struts*
> 
> *Ever since the budget cuts*
> 
> *I burn old boosters I have found*
> 
> *Short, but not too big around*
> 
> *I'm a kerb of means by no means*
> 
> *King of the void*
> 
> *I know every engineer of every spaceplane*
> 
> *All the controllers, and all of their names*
> 
> *I know every free snack at every stop*
> 
> *And every craft that ain't nailed down from Moho to Bop*
> 
> *I sing,*
> 
> *Spaceships for sale or rent...*
> 
> 
> 
> Happy landings!
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> 'It's an entirely different kind of flying.'

Great song!

Speaking of ham sandwiches and Gilly:

Wouldn't be better to "land" the lander on Gilly and use the claw to directly attach a miner? The gravity is low enough that you could use RCS to position as needed.

Breakthrough! 

 I was giving rep to random people so I could give more to Kuzzter when suddenly the forum told me I had given out too much rep in 24 hours, I guess I have nothing to do! ![:sealed:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_lipssealed.gif)

Also...

**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹**ENOUGH WITH HAM SANDWICHES AND GILLY!!!
shhh, quiet in the library.

> 
> Wouldn't be better to "land" the lander on Gilly and use the claw to directly attach a miner? The gravity is low enough that you could use RCS to position as needed.

Actually I have been landing on the tail with the klaw *closed.* Kranefly's gyros are sufficient to stabilize indefinitely! 

Update soonish. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

ETA: Soundtrack for the next update:

OMG isn't that also the soundtrack of "Apocalypse Now" ??? xD

Can't wait to see the next chapter as a lot of people ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

GO GO GO Kuzzter !!!

I can't wait.

Yes!
I love how the top is entirely empty.

Whooo!
HAHAHAHA! HE did it! I thought for a moment that it would land on the ISRU stuff, but HE DID IT!
I'm definitely cheering as much as Gene and the rest of his team are right now! As I assume the other readers are doing as well!
YAY! "You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to Kuzzter again."
Reading it with the soundtrack playing makes all the difference!

Wooooo! Love that Billmobile!

I hope it's as excellent as I think, because I have a hunch it's got a fair ways to drive.

Happy landings!

ETA: I see Mort's memos are receiving their proper level of respect now.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-07T23:37:34Z" title="10/07/2015 11:37  PM" data-short="8 yr">October 7, 2015</time> by Starhawk**
Wow, loved the build up to the reveal of the contents of that container.

> 
> Wooooo! Love that Billmobile!
> I hope it's as excellent as I think, because I have a hunch it's got a fair ways to drive.
> 
> Happy landings!

Looks like the way is clear though.

Would be faster than trying to walk though for sure.
I read the comic too fast for the soundtrack to catch up.

Wernher, you're drinking too much khampagne for your own good.

No! You can't drink khodka either.

No wonder all his rockets crash...

Anyways, great update! I can't wait to see Bob's reaction to first sight of the Billmobile!

ETA: Woo! Page 100!

> 
> ETA: Woo! Page 100!

Now this just needs 11 times the views and 6ish times the replies to become a thread the size of Captain's Edition!

Bad-S indeed ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I held my breath reading through re-entry phase, and started to ventilate my lungs again only when parachutes popped out ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Such an awesome story...

I did wonder exactly how the Billmobile was going to be unpacked from the container. Aerial deployment is pretty BadS! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
